normalised: **E-d-T-e-c-h: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to Funding!**

unnormalised: **EdTech: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to Funding!**
normalised: Stressed about college fees? Chill! Scholarship portals are the desi parents’ answer to the "beta, padhai pe focus karo" problem. These online platforms are like treasure troves, listing scholarships for everything from engineering at I-I-T Delhi to Kathak training in Jaipur!

unnormalised: Stressed about college fees? Chill! Scholarship portals are the desi parents’ answer to the "beta, padhai pe focus karo" problem. These online platforms are like treasure troves, listing scholarships for everything from engineering at IIT Delhi to Kathak training in Jaipur!
normalised: Think of it as your personalized scholarship scout. Sites like Buddy four Study and Vidya Lakshmi (started back on fifteenth august two thousand and fifteen) are super popular. They let you filter by course, caste, or even your parents' income. Sawant from Mumbai cracked his medical entrance thanks to a scholarship he found on one such portal – imagine that!

unnormalised: Think of it as your personalized scholarship scout. Sites like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi (started back on 15/08/2015) are super popular. They let you filter by course, caste, even your parents' income. Sawant from Mumbai cracked his medical entrance thanks to a scholarship he found on one such portal – imagine that!
normalised: And it's not just for the academically gifted. Many have sports scholarships or even support students from rural backgrounds, giving everyone a fair shot. Remember to apply before the deadline, usually before five zero zero hours on thirtieth june two thousand and twenty four. Don't miss out – your education is worth it. Some even offer rupees five thousand towards application fees! Sign up today, and at ten zero zero on first july two thousand and twenty four, you might just have your future sorted! Jai Hind!

unnormalised: And it's not just for the academically gifted. Many have sports scholarships or even support students from rural backgrounds, giving everyone a fair shot. Remember to apply before the deadline, usually before 17:00 hrs on 30/06/2024. Don't miss out – your education is worth it. Some even offer Rs. 5000 towards application fees! Sign up today, and at 10:00 on 01/07/2024, you might just have your future sorted! Jai Hind!
